directions: Place the cottage cheese in a food processor and blend until creamy. Whisk in the flavored gelatin powder, then fold in the thawed whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 2 (0.3 ounce) packages sugar-free lemon flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (8 ounce) container lite frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Cottage Cheese Fluff
